actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

official_title: To designate Pennsylvania State Route 60 and United States Routes 22 and 30 as part of the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.

summary.text: Designates a certain segment of Pennsylvania State Route 60 and a segment of U.S. Routes 22 and 30 (all to be later designated as Interstate Route 376) as future parts of the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.

titles.title: To designate Pennsylvania State Route 60 and United States Routes 22 and 30 as part of the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.
